attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2014-1282

Date: 2014-11-20

Whereas The Beauvallon Board of Trade in Alberta, the certificate of formation of which was recorded pursuant to the Boards of Trade Act on May 6, 1986, has ceased to exercise its franchises;

 

Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act, dissolves The Beauvallon Board of Trade.


Attendu que The Beauvallon Board of Trade (Alberta), dont le certificat de formation a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 6 mai 1986, a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil dissout The Beauvallon Board of Trade.

Whereas The Beauvallon Board of Trade in Alberta, the certificate of formation of which was recorded pursuant to the Boards of Trade Act on May 6, 1986, has ceased to exercise its franchises;


 


Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act, dissolves The Beauvallon Board of Trade.



Attendu que The Beauvallon Board of Trade (Alberta), dont le certificat de formation a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 6 mai 1986, a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,


 


À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil dissout The Beauvallon Board of Trade.
